articles.title: FTC distributes $72M to Fortnite customers tricked into making unwanted purchases - TechCrunch
articles.description: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Monday announced that it's sending the first round of payments to consumers tricked by Fortnite maker Epic Games into
articles.content: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Monday announced that it’s sending the first round of payments to consumers tricked by Fortnite maker Epic Games into making unwanted purchases, with refunds tota… [+1961 chars]
